translated: There's a fine line between assertiveness and aggression.

original: Il est puceau.
translated: He is a virgin.

original: Elle préférerait que je prenne le bus.
translated: She would prefer that I take the bus.

original: J'ai honte de ce que j'ai fait.
translated: I'm ashamed of what I did.

original: C'est sa maison.
translated: This is her house.

original: Tu devras cuire davantage de nourriture.
translated: You'll have to cook more food.

original: Elle se porte bien, n’est-ce pas?
translated: She's in good health, isn't she?

original: Je lui ai demandé, mais elle n'a pas répondu.
translated: I asked her but she didn't answer.

original: Que vous êtes grand !
translated: How big you are!

original: Tom a bien choisi.
translated: Tom chose well.

original: Nous soupirâmes tous de soulagement.
translated: We all breathed a sigh of relief.

original: J'étudie le français depuis quatre ans maintenant.
translated: I have been studying French four years now.

original: Mon cœur est faible.
translated: My heart is weak.

original: Nous sommes arrivés à un endroit où la route se sépare en deux.
translated: We came to a place where the road branched into two lanes.

original: Qui est la chanteuse principale du groupe, cette année ?
translated: Who's the lead singer of the group this year?

original: Je sais exactement ce que je devrais faire.
translated: I know exactly what I should do.

original: J'ai enfin les moyens nécessaires pour acheter le genre de voiture que j'ai toujours voulu.
translated: I finally have enough money to buy the kind of car I've always wanted.

original: Je ne peux pas tout réparer tout seul.
translated: I can't fix everything by myself.

original: Y a-t-il au frigo quelque chose qu'on puisse boire ?
translated: Is there something in the fridge we can drink?

original: Je ne peux pas manger de chocolat !
translated: I can't eat chocolate!

original: L'ara bleu est en voie d'extinction.
translated: The blue macaw is on its way to extinction.

original: Il a acheté un billet d'avion.
translated: He bought a plane ticket.

original: Je souhaiterais vraiment que vous ne fassiez pas ça.
translated: I really wish you wouldn't do that.

original: Je dois aller à l'école.
translated: I have to go to school.

original: Je suis un mauvais perdant.
translated: I'm not a good loser.

original: Il étudiait la manière dont les oiseaux volent.
translated: He studied the way birds fly.

original: Pourquoi ne le lis-tu pas toi-même ?
translated: Why don't you read it for yourself?

original: Le comportement de cet enfant est tout simplement terrible.
translated: This child's behaviour is just terrible.

original: Il évita son regard.
translated: He averted his gaze.
